column4: ok so i'm trying to stop my network manager from running i ran a service Network-Manager stop command but that doesn't seem to have worked
it is fairly hard to stop nm as it gets started by various dbus messages whenever you plug something in. supposedly putting something in /etc/interfaces will prevent nm from managing that interface
lol yea i'm starting to realize that.....any thoughts on what it would be?
truth be told i just need to stop wpa_supplicant dhclient these two processes
